channel.title: Projects on Wenbo Lv
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Wenbo Lv

item.title: arcR
item.description: goal The goal of arcR is to integrate the benefits of R and ArcGIS with using ArcGIS in R. document You can see the document of arcR in here source code The source code of arcR is in here

item.title: gdverse
item.description: goal The goal of gdverse is to support the geodetector model and its variants. document You can see the document of gdverse in here source code The source code of gdverse is in here

item.title: geosom
item.description: goal The goal of geosom is to achieve Spatially-Aware Self-Organizing Maps(GeoSOM) Model in R. document You can see the document of geosom in here source code The source code of geosom is in here

item.title: spatbox
item.description: source code The source code of spatbox is in here

item.title: spEcula
item.description: goal The goal of spEcula is to make it easier to use R for spatial prediction based on spatial dependence, spatial stratification heterogeneity and geographical configuration similarity, and spatial statistical inference based on spatial relationships (the three laws of geography) document You can see the document of spEcula in here source code The source code of spEcula is in here

item.title: tidyrgeoda
item.description: goal The goal of tidyrgeoda is to provide an interface for rgeoda to integrate with sf objects and the tidyverse. document You can see the document of tidyrgeoda in here source code The source code of tidyrgeoda is in here
